name: Ransom Chapter 3
description:
The party arrives at the Dutchess castle. While Gregory and the knight are talking with the Dutchess, Geraldine and the merchant are asked to guard the wagon full of ransom money. Suddenly, 3 guards find out and Geraldine decides to pretend to be a prostitute. She takes on the three guards, first she will rub one of their dicks, suck on another while taking one in her pussy as well. Then they switch positions where she will be on top one of the guards who is fucking her ass, then another guard will fuck her pussy and then she will give a handjob to the other guard.  Part 2

Instruction: Each time the cursor is available, you have to carry out an action by using four controls. The simple click, where you find a hotspot, and click on it. The double click, where you find a hot spot and click on it but when you release the cursor is still visible and you need to find a second hot spot. The click and move, where you find a hot spot and click on it, and then without releasing the button, you move in the direction where the action must occur. The last, the come and go, where it works like the click and move but the movement must be coming and going.
